question: Countries are becoming more and more similar because people are able to buy the same products anywhere in the world.Do you think this is a positive or negative development?
text: Many regions are having analogous traits. This might be explained by the public that is sharing the same fashionable trend through internet. This made the public forum unifying aesthetic to select the items. I utterly believe that this will bring pernicious development on different aspects of a contrary.

As tradition is the basis for a contrary, it is inextricably chained hereditary artefact. While people are effortless to reach each corner of the world, global promotion will bother the public in purchasing. At the same time, the craftsman will coerce to gradually disappear. When the trait of each contrary is overlapped, the world will be just for lack of richness and diversity.

Other than that, tourism would be damaged by lacking of discrepancy, the curiosity of foreigners will diminish. Because travellers are reluctant to explore a place where they have visited in advance. As it can be viewed, albeit the technology helps the public to purchase global products easily, and to advertise the products for the sellers.
